instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1932: What is A1932? A1932 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Late 2018, 2019 with EMC 3184, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01521..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message: Pressing button with no result. It's not giving "Forbidden" icon due sensor, there is just no icon. If i put tu use "F"

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
Be sure the keys are good.
Any history available, liquid sign?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
No liquid, no history. Broken screen, changed it and found that it doesnt work ( i am not sure if before display replacement it was working, but mu gues it wasnot). Also tried another screen with same result, tried PRAM and SMC restes.
As i told in my first post, i am sure that keys are working because with Fn it is making clicking sound

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
" If i put tu use "F" "
You might want to say, but not really said.

Probably ALS sensor doesn't work now.
Direct flashlight on webcam area and check if LCD backlight reacts.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message: you are right, seems be ALS sensors. Automaticly adjust brightner also disappeared for display settings.  Anything to check on logic board?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message: Connect webcam from original screen and check it.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
ok. ANy way old display is totally destroyed. Will try if keyboard backlight start working with old display. 

Anyway:

As i remember if internal display is disconected, keyboard backlight is automaticly on, right?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
with old display also no keyboard backlight. 


Also even there is no automatic brightness adjustmen, at least on display, i can do it manually. But on keyboard i dont even get this icon: 


[IMG]https://cdn.osxdaily.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/backlit-keyboard-not-working.jpg[/IMG]

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
T2 corruption could be a good reason of your symptom then.
Try DFU restore...

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message: Or just garbage replacement display assembly like a lot of them for T2 machines areâ€¦

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
Tried revive through Apple Configurator, but no changes.


P.S. Flashed it second time and now i have backlight on keyboard but only when i am on user passwords screen. Once i put password and it loads the system machine is back exactly in first post situation.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
I bet for LCD assembly problem; missing ALS sensor probably.
Is the cheap version, or true tone?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard backlight funcion desappear.
threads.message:
I dont even know that there are this two qualities. Anyway cuatomer take it away without keyboard backlight.

PS. Even if ALS sensor is missing keyboard backlight must light when press the button. I testes it with no display on other air and keyboard  is lighting
